## Readings
- {{< fa book >}} Bauman KE. Chapter 4: Intervention designs. In Research Methods for Community Health and Welfare. 1980. p. 27-30 and 35-39.
- {{< fa book >}} Shadish WR, Cook TD, Campbell DT. Chapter 4: Quasi-experimental designs that lack either a control group or lack pretest observations on the outcome. 2002. p. 115-122.
